Seattle Washington:"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_166","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"Drug company execs are nervous. That's because the greatest health advance in decades has hit the streets. And analysts expect it to put a huge crimp in "Big Pharma" profits.

So what's all the fuss about? It's about a new "health enhancing cocktail" that's changing the lives of millions who use it. Some doctors call it "the greatest discovery since penicillin"! And their patients call it "a miracle!"

The name of the product is the AloeCure. And since it's completely drug-free; the product is available to anyone who wants it, at a reasonable price. But it won't stay like that forever. Not if Big Pharma has its way. "},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_90","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px;"},"content":"TOP DOC WARNS: DIGESTION DRUGS CAN CRIPPLE YOU!"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_119","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"Company spokesper-son, Dr. Liza Leal; a leading integrative health specialist out of Texas recommends an AloeCure health cocktail before she prescribes any digestion drug. Especially after the FDA's stern warning about long-term use of drugs like Prilosec® , Nexium®, and Prevacid®. In a nutshell, the FDA statement warned people should avoid taking digestion drugs for longer than 14-days; you risk spine and hip damage. Most people take them for decades."

Dr. Leal should know. Many patients come to her with bone and joint complaints and she does everything she can to help them. One way for digestion sufferers to help avoid possible risk of tragic joint and bone problems caused by overuse of digestion drugs; is to take the AloeCure."},{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"","id":"div_181","style":"overflow: visible; background-color: rgb(209, 209, 209); height: 65px; margin-bottom: 15px; margin-top: 15px;"},"nodes":[{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_149","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgba(191, 191, 191, 0);"},"content":"Analysts expect the AloeCure to put a huge crimp in "Big Pharma" profits."}]},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_180","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"The secret to the AloeCure's "health adjusting" formula is aloe vera. But not the same aloe vera that mom used to apply to your cuts, scrapes and bruises. This revolutionary strain of aloe is grown in special Asian soil; under very strict conditions. And despite its surprisingly pleasant taste, the AloeCure is so powerful it begins to benefit your health the instant you drink it. It soothes intestinal discomfort and avoids the possibility of bone and health damage caused by overuse of digestion drugs. Much like aloe works externally on cuts, bruises and abrasions. Studies show"}]},{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"col-md-4","style":"text-align:center;","id":"div_25"},"nodes":[{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_97","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"aloe has dozens of health applications..."},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_131","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px;"},"content":"HELPS CALM DOWN PAINFUL INFLAMMATION"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_62","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"According to a leading aloe research scientist, the amazing plant compounds in Aloe have a powerful anti-inflammatory effect. Inflammation is your body's first reaction to damage. So whether it's damage that is physical, bacterial, chemical or auto-immune; the natural plant compounds in aloe helps soothe inflammation — rapidly reducing redness, heat and swelling."},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_202","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;"},"content":"RAPID ACID AND HEARTBURN FIX"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_203","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"At first, Aloe proved to have an astonishing effect on users who suffer with digestion problems like occasional acid reflux, heartburn, cramping, gas and constipation. But new studies prove it does a whole lot more."},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_278","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;"},"content":"SLEEP LIKE A BABY"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_279","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"A night without sleep really damages your body. And continued lost sleep can lead to all sorts of health problems. But what you may not realize is the reason why you're not sleeping. Some call it "Ghost Reflux". A low-intensity form of acid reflux discomfort that quietly keeps you awake in the background. A couple of teaspoons of the AloeCure will help you sleep more soundly and comfortably through the night."},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_358","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;"},"content":"UNLEASH YOUR MEMORY"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_359","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"Think about it. If you kept dumping fat and grease down your drain; how long do you think it would take to clog it up? The answer is, not very long at all. And that's exactly what happens to your brain every time you eat processed, fried or fatty foods. Studies show that your brain needs the healthy bacteria from your gut in order function at its best. "},{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"","id":"div_442","style":"overflow: visible; background-color: rgb(209, 209, 209); height: 65px; margin-bottom: 15px; margin-top: 15px;"},"nodes":[{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_443","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgba(191, 191, 191, 0); margin-top: 2px;"},"content":"Doctors call it "The greatest health discovery in decades!" A 2015 medical study showed long-term use of digestion meds may be a leading cause of heart damage. Getting off those meds and drinking the AloeCure daily, helps you support a healthy heart."},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_579","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px; margin-top: 10px;"},"content":"CELEBRITY HAIR, SKIN & NAILS"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_626","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"Certain antacids may greatly reduce your"}]},{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"col-md-4","style":"text-align:center;","id":"div_26"},"nodes":[{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_674","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"body's ability to break down and absorb calcium. Aloe delivers calcium as it aids in balancing your stomach acidity. The result? Thicker, healthier looking hair...more youthful looking skin...And nails so strong they may never break again."},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_723","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px;"},"content":"OPTIMIZE YOUR LIVER"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_773","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"Your liver cleans out your blood and neutralizes its toxins. Without it, your body would be overrun with deadly toxins and a frail immune system. Aloe helps neutralize and remove toxic acids from your bloodstream. Studies suggest, if you started taking aloe today; you'd see a big difference in the way you feel, in no time at all."},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_824","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px;"},"content":"GUARANTEED RESULTS OR DOUBLE YOUR MONEY BACK"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_825","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"Due to the incredible results people are reporting, AloeCure is being sold with an equally incredible guarantee.

"We can only offer this incredible guarantee because we are 100% certain this product will work for those who use it," says Dr. Leal. "},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_930","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px;"},"content":"RISK FREE SUPPLY"},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_931","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":"The makers of AloeCure are excited to offer you a risk free supply. So you can get it into your hands, (before the drug companies force it off the market). Take advantage of this special opportunity to try the AloeCure in your own home for a full 60 days. Don't worry, it's completely risk-free.

If you don't see remarkable changes in your digestion, your body, and your overall health... Simply return it for a full refund less shipping and handling... No questions asked, ever! Just call TOLL-FREE 1-888-532-4409 to take advantage of this risk free offer before it's too late. This offer is limited to readers of this newspaper."},{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"","id":"div_1041","style":"overflow: visible; background-color: rgb(209, 209, 209); height: 65px; margin-bottom: 15px; margin-top: 15px;"},"nodes":[{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_1042","style":"overflow: visible; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 16px; background-color: rgba(191, 191, 191, 0); margin-top: 2px;"},"content":"DOCTOR'S EVERYWHERE ARE EXCITED ABOUT THE ALOECURE:"}]},{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_1099","style":"overflow: visible; text-align: left;"},"content":""My first experience recommending AloeCure was of a 46 year patient who developed a stomach ulcer due to stress. I suggested that he take AloeCure and the worst was over within 3 days. After using AloeCure intensely for that time I cut him back to just "use as needed."

To my colleagues, if you're not using AloeCure, you really need to. To all patients there is powerful help available, find a practitioner who knows of AloeCure."}]}]}]},{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"container","id":"div_2288","style":"overflow: visible; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); width: 1000px; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 15px;"},"nodes":[{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"container","id":"div_2420","style":"overflow: visible; max-height: 100%; max-width: 100%; width: 950px;"},"nodes":[{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"row row_class","style":"text-align: center; overflow: visible; margin-top: 25px;","id":"div_1157"},"nodes":[{"tag":"div","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"col-md-12","style":"text-align: center; overflow: visible; border: 1px solid rgb(207, 207, 207); padding-bottom: 0px; margin-bottom: 5px; width: 975px; padding-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;","id":"div_1158"},"nodes":[{"tag":"span","endtag":1,"attributes":{"class":"paragraph span_but_p_tag","id":"p_1159","style":"overflow: visible; font-size: 10px; color: rgb(163, 163, 163); margin-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 0px;"},"content":"THESE STATEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION, THIS PRODUCT IS NOT INTENDED TO 0IABNOSE.
